item.title: Pharmacy Malpractice in Texas: All You Need to Know
item.description: When you fill a prescription at your local, grocery, or chain pharmacy, you trust that the highly trained pharmacist will dispense the correct medication at the proper dosage. But far too often, pharmacy errors lead to dangerous drug interactions, overdoses, and even death. If you or a loved one has been seriously harmed by a medication mistake, you may be entitled to significant compensation under Texas law.
